thread.section_title: eSpares.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.espares.co.uk
thread.title: Miss Helen Fitzpatrick
thread.title_full: eSpares.co.uk reviewed by Miss Helen Fitzpatrick

author: Miss Helen Fitzpatrick
title: Miss Helen Fitzpatrick
text:
I needed a new grill pan for a very old Zanussi oven. With the age of it, they aren't made any more but eSpares have a generic grill pan that fits a lot of ovens and this was spot on for what I needed.
I ordered quite a late on the Saturday and it arrived on the Wednesday and it was so nice to have a grill pan again!
It was very easy to find what I needed and order it on the eSpares website and their prices seems very competitive. They will be my first stop from now on and I'd recommend them.
